items.sentence: Thanks for lending me the money that I needed.
I'll be living in Boston with my grandparents.
You may borrow my bicycle anytime you want to.
Both boys got on their bicycles and rode away.
If only I had a map, I could show you the way.
I can't read what's written on the blackboard.
Have you ever accepted a ride from a stranger?
I have to go back to the hospital next Monday.
Tom stopped in the middle of the intersection.
I showed Tom the pictures I'd taken in Boston.
